title.rendered: Human pose estimation: approaches, use cases, and implementation tips

yoast_head_json.description: We take a dive into the innards of human pose estimation technology, focusing on the approaches to implementing posture recognition models and the technology use cases, and share tips from ITRex’s CTO on how to implement human pose estimation quickly and stress-free.
